unit: Unit 8 | Inference for Categorical Data: Chi-Square
title: ${ \chi }^{ 2 }$ Test of Independence: Expected Cells
question_text:
A student wondered if there was an association between relationship status and overall letter grade(based off grade point average) at her high school. She used a stratified random sample to select 20 students within each letter grade. The information is displayed in the table below.
Which of the following expressions gives the expected number of students who are in relationship and have an overall letter grade of a B?
tables:
Letter GradeIn a relationshipNot in a relationship
A812
B119
C137
D1010
F614
